title: Medieval Engineers Deluxe Edtion v.02.038.007 Cracked-3DM
description:
Release Description:

Medieval Engineers is a sandbox game about engineering, construction and the maintenance of architectural works and mechanical equipment using medieval technology. Players build cities, castles and fortifications; construct mechanical devices and engines; perform landscaping and underground mining.
The game is inspired by real medieval technology and the way people built architectural works and mechanical equipment using medieval technology. Medieval Engineers strives to follow the laws of physics and history and doesnâ€™t use any technologies that were not available in the 5th to 15th centuries.

Features:

    - Creative â€“ unlimited resources, instant building, invulnerability, levitation
    Single-player
    Multi-player â€“ will be added in a future update
    Barbarians â€“ coming soonâ€¦
    First-person & Third-person
    Voxel hand â€“ shape the terrain and its material (right now only creative mode voxel hand is implemented)
    Block types:
    - Small: 0.25 meter (25 centimeters)
    - Large: 2.5 meters
    - Dynamic: can be used to construct carriages and machinery that is supposed to be moved around
    - Static: immovable and connected to earth; if a heavy load breaks its structural integrity it cracks and unsupported parts become dynamic
    Building blocks: stone walls (various shapes â€“ from blocky to rounded), wooden walls and flooring, roofs (ceramic, thatched, hay), power source blocks (manual human labor), stored energy blocks (torsion spring), leverages, weights, swings, ropes, wooden beams of various length and shapeâ€¦ More will be added in future!
    Realistic physics â€“ structural integrity, destructible objects (everything: from blocks to terrain), real proportions, volume, mass, storage capacity, integrity
    Steam Workshop â€“ share your creations with the Community
    Modding â€“ world files, 3D models, textures, shaders, API (scripting in-game objects in C#)
    32-bit & 64-bit â€“ 64-bit version expands the amount of objects and blocks (almost unlimited) and terrain
    World management â€“ generate new worlds, â€œsave asâ€ to multiple copies, auto-save every 5 minutes (can be turned on/off), edit world settings
